description: Frontend developer at Borrowell, a Canadian FinTech with over 1.5 million users focused on providing financial stability through credit monitoring tools.

Work is split between the growth marketing platform - leveraging GatsbyJS (React) as a static site generator to make beautiful, user friendly, and SEO optimized web applications - and the mobile team, where I write web components with React Native.
I work on a cross functional team, collaborating with designers and project owners, as well as key stakeholders to deliver exceptional user experiences.
